min-delay.name: Minimum wait
min-delay.description: How long it has to be before a checkpoint can be placed (in seconds).

max-delay.name: Maximum wait
max-delay.description: How long it has to be before a checkpoint is forced to be placed (in seconds). Setting this to 0 places a checkpoint every frame.

dash.name: Block checkpoints while dashing
dash.description: Whether checkpoints are not placed while dashing

death.name: Block checkpoints while dying
death.description: Whether checkpoints are not placed while dying

gamemode.name: Checkpoint on gamemode change
gamemode.description: Whether a checkpoint is placed when your gamemode is changed.

speed.name: Checkpoint on speed change
speed.description: Whether a checkpoint is placed when your speed is changed.

size.name: Checkpoint on size change
size.description: Whether a checkpoint is placed when your size is changed.

dual.name: Checkpoint on dual change
dual.description: Whether a checkpoint is placed when you change between dual or not dual.

gravity.name: Checkpoint on gravity change
gravity.description: Whether a checkpoint is placed when your gravity is changed.

direction.name: Checkpoint on direction change
direction.description: Whether a checkpoint is placed when your direction is changed.
